item.title: Stocks Fall as Drugmakers Hit After Trump Letters: Markets Wrap
item.description: A rally in stocks fizzled out ahead of President Donald Trump’s tariff deadline, with the White House demanding drugmakers to slash US prices. Bond yields fell. The dollar rose.
